endpoints.description: Submit a customer's age information for eligibility verification based on legal requirements.
Retrieve the status and decision of a previously submitted age verification transaction.
Upload an image of the customer's identification for detailed scrutiny and validation.
Fetch a list of countries wherein the age verification service is compliant and operational.
Check the eligibility using the customer's date of birth.
Retrieve a comprehensive log of past verification transactions for audit and reporting.
Erase a specific verification transaction from records, ensuring data privacy.
Access the terms, policies, and operational guidelines of the age verification service.
Modify the account-specific settings and preferences for service customization.
List all notifications and alerts related to verification activities and system statuses.
